fd30c67c-fe97-4090-8b25-09ba3cf33c12.description: Participants who complete the three consecutive year Securities Industry Institute® program are awarded a SIFMA/Wharton Certificate. SII certificates are recognized by leading firms in the securities industry and exemplify a participant’s abilities and commitment to high learning in industry and investment knowledge and professional development.
fd30c67c-fe97-4090-8b25-09ba3cf33c12.name: Securities Industry Institute® (SII) Executive Education Program

badge_template_activities.title: Selection by firm leadership to enroll in the Securities Industry Institute®
Engage with Wharton faculty, visiting faculty, industry practitioners and global peers
Complete 3 year executive education program, consisting of over 90 hours of in-person sessions.

719118a9-3ab6-4876-b15e-5b515c15f929.description: The Executive Development Program is a dynamic immersive learning experience for leaders who are transitioning from functional, unit, or regional management to general management, and require new knowledge in areas such as finance, marketing, and strategy. The earner of this credential is able to manage the complexities of organizational dynamics and cross-border communications, and is prepared for global leadership. He or she also gains a powerful network of global peers.
719118a9-3ab6-4876-b15e-5b515c15f929.name: Executive Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this immersive, powerful Wharton Comprehensive Executive program.
Complete the two-week on-campus, or three-week live virtual experience, engaging with faculty, executive coaches, and global peers.
Participate in the intensive in-depth coaching sessions during and after the program.

d3b45cd0-ac02-4c84-8e59-6b56a969b8d1.description: Successfully completing the Venture Capital program signifies that holders of this badge have learned a framework to negotiate, price, and structure the best investor terms and have a comprehensive understanding of what it takes to raise capital from limited partners. Additionally, holders of this badge have learned how to screen, analyze, and value high-growth investment opportunities and know how to determine when and how to exit an investment.
d3b45cd0-ac02-4c84-8e59-6b56a969b8d1.name: Venture Capital

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

5e02350d-a3d2-40b3-ab2f-58c38078bb75.description: Today’s CFOs are expected to be both trusted advisors and strategic decision makers within a business. Holders of the badge from The CFO: Becoming a Strategic Partner can excel at taking highly unstructured and ambiguous situations and putting structure around them by integrating information from multiple sources. Executives who successfully complete this program have enhanced their ability to forecast, measure, and monitor business performance; manage risk; and generate predictive insights.
5e02350d-a3d2-40b3-ab2f-58c38078bb75.name: The CFO: Becoming a Strategic Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to to accepted in this Wharton Leadership program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

f4f52dfb-07cc-4dc9-966a-2666738374c8.description: Wharton’s General Management Program is a diverse, flexible learning journey for senior leaders with a desire for knowledge across business disciplines. Earners of this credential have a passion for learning that is fueled by a desire for new tools and concepts that can be put into immediate practice and result in competitive advantage. Upon successful completion, participants join Wharton's 99,000+ global alumni network.
f4f52dfb-07cc-4dc9-966a-2666738374c8.name: General Management Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into Wharton's Comprehensive Executive program, a diverse, flexible learning journey.
Design your six-week learning journey over a two-year period, choosing from more than 35 rigorous and experiential programs.
The Admissions Committee may request a letter of recommendation, written by someone who can attest to your professional achievements and provide additional information about your professional goals.

8ad82872-d9d5-45b8-94d8-073330deec24.description: Private equity managers are sought after for their ability to confidently evaluate investments in the private equity space. Earners of the credential from Private Equity: Investing and Creating Value have a keen understanding of the stages of private equity investment, deal structure, and key market drivers affecting investment decisions. They have the ability to analyze deals from various viewpoints and identify new opportunities for investment.
8ad82872-d9d5-45b8-94d8-073330deec24.name: Private Equity: Investing and Creating Value

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners and global peers.

c66ca0d8-a1a7-43d8-8c15-abf4bd80a3b0.description: Senior-level executives who need to understand how to manage the complexities of the merger process come away with robust tactical knowledge after attending and completing this Mergers and Acquisitions program. Earners of this credential can identify acquisition strategies, understand how deals are executed, and know how acquisitions are integrated successfully.
c66ca0d8-a1a7-43d8-8c15-abf4bd80a3b0.name: Mergers and Acquisitions

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.

77ca5bc9-750f-434b-b6eb-b2b6d3ddd89f.description: Holders of this badge have completed a course within the Citi Wharton Global Wealth Institute suite of programs. Programs include Wealth Management Essentials, Maximizing Client Relationships, Wealth Management: Growth Strategies, Excellence in Sales Leadership and Advanced Sales Leadership. They have improved business acumen and gained new leadership, client facing expertise, and a great understanding of Citi strategy. As a result, they've become a better holistic relationship or sales manager.
77ca5bc9-750f-434b-b6eb-b2b6d3ddd89f.name: Citi | Wharton Global Wealth Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Wealth Management Essentials: Establishes a common language around Citi’s relationship-manager role profile and competencies.
Maximizing Client Relationships: Includes in-depth analysis of industry trends, relationship psychology, and global financial strategies.

Wealth Management: Growth Strategies: Deepens understanding of earlier concepts while introducing new ideas to further extend participants’ mastery of relationship building and more complex wealth management topics.
Excellence in Sales Leadership: Arms leaders with the tools to coach their teams in light of ever-changing environments, from lifetime value of the customer, to maintaining an innovative mindset.
Advanced Sales Leadership – Dives deeper into helping RM’s to better understand the customer, build high performing teams, as well as continue to build more sticky and lasting client relationships.
Participants must be employees from the top percentile of Citi’s 3,000 relationship managers and ﬁnancial advisors worldwide.

76a1cb5b-e20e-4eff-b7b8-2987af55a3e7.description: Strategy and Management for Competitive Advantage, formerly titled Creating and Implementing Strategy for Competitive Advantage, presents a comprehensive approach to strategy development that stresses the importance of trade-offs and fit in achieving and sustaining a competitive advantage. Earners enhanced their ability to assess competitors and main competitive advantage, learned to plan and coordinate strategy across multiple lines of business, and became better managerial decision makers.
76a1cb5b-e20e-4eff-b7b8-2987af55a3e7.name: Strategy and Management for Competitive Advantage

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Strategy program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

65c7bfd1-cafd-414e-aac9-9e7c3ced969a.description: Earners of this Wharton Finance for Executives badge have mastered key financial analysis and evaluation tools and can apply them to the business. They gained a solid understanding of corporate finance and its role as a critical business skill set. They have also become more persuasive communicators when dealing with corporate finance decision makers.
65c7bfd1-cafd-414e-aac9-9e7c3ced969a.name: Wharton Finance for Executives

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

5e782453-d244-4456-a508-ec21f66d39ac.description: Finance and Accounting for the Non-Financial Manager, formerly titled Integrating Finance and Strategy for Value Creation, allows non-financial business executives to become better users of financial information so they can be more strategic contributors to their organization. Earners of this badge learned financial terminology, general financial principles, & financial statements interpretation. They gained exposure to diverse financial approaches and became adept in financial decision making.
5e782453-d244-4456-a508-ec21f66d39ac.name: Finance and Accounting for the Non-Financial Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.

519fa124-6714-45b3-960e-d819884781ab.description: Holders of this badge have completed Wharton's Distressed Asset Investing and Corporate Restructuring program. The program explores how and why a company fails and the financial turnaround process. Participants have sharpened their ability to foresee signs of crisis in a firm’s financial statements, spot promising investment opportunities, and hone negotiation skills to maximize returns.
519fa124-6714-45b3-960e-d819884781ab.name: Distressed Asset Investing and Corporate Restructuring

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance Program.
Complete the 5 day program, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners and global peers.

25b7ac10-8ace-49f6-ac05-7fe4cf76ccea.description: Adopting an analytics mindset can influence the way employees approach business problems. Earners of this Customer Analytics badge have examined analytics from three critical foundations: descriptive, predictive, and prescriptive, and learned how to apply design and implement a data-analysis strategy for their organization. They have also evaluated the latest AI applications, learned best practices for recruiting and managing data science teams, and gained a powerful new network of global peers.
25b7ac10-8ace-49f6-ac05-7fe4cf76ccea.name: Customer Analytics for Growth Using Machine Learning, AI and Big Data

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Marketing program.

bc4133f1-c921-4f1c-862d-389b0776a6c6.description: Investment Strategies and Portfolio Management is expertly designed to help investment professionals and financial advisors interpret and understand the market data and capitalize on the investment opportunities that are emerging today. Holders of this badge have completed a five-day program, and learned to create optimal investment portfolios and critically evaluate investment management options using new data and how to unpack the macroeconomic outlook in the U.S. and internationally.
bc4133f1-c921-4f1c-862d-389b0776a6c6.name: Investment Strategies and Portfolio Management

badge_template_activities.title: Apply for acceptance into Wharton's rigorous, flexible Finance learning journey.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

315e631e-85fa-404b-82a4-8b47b5478e24.description: Participants of the Chief Human Resource Officer Program have received this badge of completion of this 9-month experience, along with the tools to develop a strategic mindset, hone their effective decision-making skills, and take their organization’s talent to the next level. This self-paced hybrid program is delivered in partnership with Emeritus.
315e631e-85fa-404b-82a4-8b47b5478e24.name: Chief Human Resources Officer Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Online Partnership program.
In addition to the Online portion, participants must attend a 2-day immersion on the Philadelphia campus.

64cd6408-d12e-4c41-ac2f-f9b037300532.description: Wharton Executive Education's five-week flagship program, the Advanced Management Program, is an immersive, transformative learning experience for global senior-level executives. Earners of this credential are highly-experienced, senior-level executives who are expert in applying business acumen and strategic solutions to complex business problems. Upon successful completion, participants join Wharton's 99,000+ global alumni network.
64cd6408-d12e-4c41-ac2f-f9b037300532.name: Advanced Management Program

alignments.name: Alumni
alignments.description: Upon completion, you will become a member of Wharton's 98,000+ global alumni network.

Experience executive coaching with Wharton elite coaching staff, including individual and group sessions.
Complete the five-week immersive experience at Wharton, engaging with faculty, practitioners, executive coaches and global peers.

663367ce-267c-48d4-ab8f-b0eb943de766.description: This executive leadership program features the latest Wharton faculty research in work motivation and engagement, emotional intelligence, women in leadership roles, and more. Earners of this Women’s Executive Leadership: Business Strategies for Success badge have gained invaluable insight into their personal leadership styles and career strengths, and mastered the building blocks of business acumen. They enhanced their professional influence and became better negotiators and decision makers.
663367ce-267c-48d4-ab8f-b0eb943de766.name: Women’s Executive Leadership: Business Strategies for Success

c609f555-9846-4d46-8a49-e0931a52f23c.description: Holders of this digital badge have completed the two-week Certified Investment Management Analyst® (CIMA®) Certification program, during which they participated in lectures, discussions, breakout sessions, and achieved a passing score on the Wharton exam. They have enhanced their investment skills, developed their ability to enhance their relationships with clients, and became highly trained and knowledgeable financial professionals.
c609f555-9846-4d46-8a49-e0931a52f23c.name: Certified Investment Management Analyst® (CIMA®) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Finance/Partnership Program.
Before registering for this program, you must submit a CIMA® application and fee to the Investments & Wealth Institute, and undergo a background check.

The final day of the program culminates with a guided practice exam session followed by a Wharton exam. Those who pass should continue their study with review materials provided by Wharton and Investments & Wealth Institute. Register for and take the CIMA® Certification Exam within 90 days.

cc29c376-24d0-4d2d-96ec-5c91e6125fe0.description: Holders of this badge have completed the Strategic Marketing for Competitive Advantage program, which is based on Wharton’s popular MBA marketing management program. They developed a thorough understanding of customers and what motivates buying behavior, learned to maximize consumer engagement through experiential marketing, conducted quantitative marketing analyses, and understood the role in a fully integrated, strategic marketing plan.
cc29c376-24d0-4d2d-96ec-5c91e6125fe0.name: Strategic Marketing for Competitive Advantage

1603d9fa-fb72-452f-a286-21a278c7e315.description: Corporate Valuation helps leaders master the advanced financial tools they need to assess the impact of strategic decisions on the value of their firms. Earners of this badge can confidently take action in ways that will produce superior financial performance and generate market-leading results.
1603d9fa-fb72-452f-a286-21a278c7e315.name: Corporate Valuation

a66c5a20-574c-4010-9aae-d78f1124f23f.description: Through Scaling Business for Profitable Growth, formerly titled Scaling Ventures: Developing the Playbook for Profitable Growth, participants explored the key challenges companies face when trying to expand operations or ramp up production. a66c5a20-574c-4010-9aae-d78f1124f23f.name: Scaling Business for Profitable Growth

02bea4c3-1ba4-4392-9686-66906f02a374.description: Wharton’s Advanced Finance Program is a rigorous, flexible learning journey for senior leaders in finance roles with a desire both deepen and expand their finance and business acumen. Earners of this credential are exposed to the latest and most powerful financial tools and concepts that can be put into immediate practice and result in competitive advantage. Upon successful completion, participants join Wharton's 99,000+ global alumni network.
02bea4c3-1ba4-4392-9686-66906f02a374.name: Advanced Finance Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance journey.

Complete your six-week learning journey over a two-year period at Wharton.

0f830cb4-86b4-4180-a0e7-608ee912e07f.description: Business Model Innovation in the Digital Age provides a systematic framework that relies on practical management. Earners of this badge have successfully participated in an auditing process that has enabled them to identify areas for potential innovation within their own organization. They have developed skills to find new avenues for growth within an existing product line or service.
0f830cb4-86b4-4180-a0e7-608ee912e07f.name: Business Model Innovation in the Digital Age

5052df62-2711-4be1-b818-cc6d251448d3.description: Holders of the Wharton Certificate of Professional Development badge have completed four Wharton Executive Education programs focused in one of these areas: Finance, Leadership, Strategy, or an individualized learning journey that covers more than one topic area. Holders of this badge have been exposed to new ideas, challenged to think differently, and have built strategic skill sets enabling them to tackle immediate and long-term business challenges.
5052df62-2711-4be1-b818-cc6d251448d3.name: Certificate of Professional Development

badge_template_activities.title: Begin your journey by applying to be accepted into your first Wharton Executive Education OE program.
Completed four Wharton Executive Education programs within a four-year period, through one of these tracks: Finance, Leadership, Strategy, or designed by the holders themselves.

e4bfbaf5-bfe8-4f3e-89ae-66500de14d67.description: Effective Execution of Organizational Strategy, formerly titled Making Strategy Work, focuses on the most important factors in implementation, including leadership, culture, organizational design, capabilities, & incentives. Participants explored those factors as they're applied at every level, from individual to organization. They learned to develop an actionable plan for executing a specific strategy and gained a new set of tools for overcoming even their most challenging execution obstacles.
e4bfbaf5-bfe8-4f3e-89ae-66500de14d67.name: Effective Execution of Organizational Strategy

123d418b-0dae-46dd-9033-e53b49090486.description: This Advance Corporate Finance program offers a deep dive into the areas of corporate finance required for senior finance executives to make informed decisions and mitigate financial risks. Earners of this badge have received a firm grounding in capital structure, risk management, financial technologies, and mergers & acquisitions.
123d418b-0dae-46dd-9033-e53b49090486.name: Advanced Corporate Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.

e9395af9-20b5-4018-91c3-6acbcc340e6a.description: The LinkedIn Paths program is a 9-week curriculum created in partnership with Wharton & LinkedIn. It is designed to drive the transformation of global talent acquisition managers into executive talent leaders shaping the future of work. It provides a variety of virtual learning experiences, including livestream lectures by Wharton faculty, self-paced online learnings, and an innovative/interactive business simulation. There are opportunities to meet & connect with peers to learn from each other.
e9395af9-20b5-4018-91c3-6acbcc340e6a.name: LinkedIn Paths: Certificate in Advanced Talent Strategy, 2021

bd684521-fbeb-4214-92df-0c75f47dd41a.description: Negotiation and Influence: Making Deals and Strategy Work is about becoming a more skillful negotiator. Earners of this badge have learned how to develop a strategy to focus on the areas that can affect the final outcome of a negotiation. They have also learned ways to strengthen and enhance their influence and gain leverage in negotiations.
bd684521-fbeb-4214-92df-0c75f47dd41a.name: Negotiation and Influence: Making Deals and Strategy Work

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership Program.
Participate in this weekly, 3-hour program, every Wednesdays for six consecutive weeks.

8395f89c-22f7-4e9f-a0f8-4680233e26ff.description: The LinkedIn Paths program is a 9-week curriculum created in partnership with Wharton & LinkedIn. It is designed to drive the transformation of global talent acquisition managers into executive talent leaders shaping the future of work. It provides a variety of virtual learning experiences, including livestream lectures by Wharton faculty, self-paced online learnings, and an innovative/interactive business simulation. There are opportunities to meet & connect with peers to learn from each other.
8395f89c-22f7-4e9f-a0f8-4680233e26ff.name: LinkedIn Paths: Certificate in Advanced Talent Strategy, 2022

1f3d341e-0cf8-4375-a080-7bba2d8d4bf1.description: Client Psychology aims to help financial advisors develop a more effective client-centered practice by drawing heavily on advances in psychology, behavioral finance, evidence-based decision making, and the human sciences. This knowledge allows them to better understand the biases, behaviors, and perceptions that impact client decision making and financial well-being. This program is offered in partnership with the CFP Board’s Center for Financial Planning.
1f3d341e-0cf8-4375-a080-7bba2d8d4bf1.name: Client Psychology

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.

995633d1-1c03-4565-a3b0-f3ff2ab5fa12.description: Business Essentials for Executives, formerly titled Building Business Acumen, focuses on the core concepts that drive business in every industry, using a mix of interactive lectures, case studies, simulations, self-assessments, & group discussions, led by Wharton MBA faculty. Badge earners learned to develop their personal negotiating style, acquired business acumen to interpret financial statements for decision making, & became better overall business leaders to execute strategic initiatives.
995633d1-1c03-4565-a3b0-f3ff2ab5fa12.name: Business Essentials for Executives

f870f295-744f-4f0a-86f3-55262d0af941.description: Holders of this badge have completed the five-day program, Corporate Governance: Essentials for a New Business Era, where they explored board opportunities for C-suite officers in areas including technology, human resources and sustainability. They have grasped how a director’s role is changing in today’s social, legal and business environment, learned to present themselves as attractive candidates for boards, and took a look inside the process for nominating, selecting and onboarding directors.
f870f295-744f-4f0a-86f3-55262d0af941.name: Corporate Governance: Essentials for a New Business Era

46a2b874-4a3e-4c30-a933-bc9af061de9e.description: Executive Negotiation Workshop: Negotiate with Confidence, formerly ENW: Bargaining for Advantage, provides earners with individualized insights & a detailed map of the hidden psychology underlying negotiation moves & tactics. Earners fully integrated negotiation skills into their most effective professional self; trained with top professionals from diverse industries, backgrounds & cultures; & gained the emotional intelligence & situational awareness to adjust negotiation strategy in real-time.
46a2b874-4a3e-4c30-a933-bc9af061de9e.name: Executive Negotiation Workshop: Negotiate with Confidence

ab06f447-369f-4627-a052-970cf3b84bca.description: Holders of this badge have successfully completed Effective Decision Making: Thinking Critically. Through the program, formerly titled The Strategic Decision-Making Mindset, they learned the decision-making process from start to finish, developed skills to make decisions in a dynamic of uncertainty, understood the role of emotions and ethics in decision making, and improved leadership skills. They have enhanced their capacity to make well-thought-out individual, group & organizational decisions.
ab06f447-369f-4627-a052-970cf3b84bca.name: Effective Decision Making: Thinking Critically and Rationally

f1c41b3e-2eb8-4659-b6eb-2c07b8433fb8.description: Holders of this badge have completed 4 days of Leading Through Challenging Times program, during which they participated lectures, interacted with faculty and peers, and contributed their own industrial insights. They learned to identify best practices for leading through uncertainty and difficulty, take tangible actions to bolster leadership, expand their readiness to face uncertainty, and become a more effective and resilient leader.
f1c41b3e-2eb8-4659-b6eb-2c07b8433fb8.name: Leading Through Challenging Times

2a1e493c-195e-4c6c-be75-2d9f8b4f4eb0.description: Leading Organizational Change is an executive leadership program led by world-renowned experts who have been at the forefront of major organizational change for decades. Holders of this badge have participated in lectures and discussions, interacted with faculty and peers, and contributed their own industrial insights. They learned to use a proven, repeatable method for increasing success in leading change initiatives, and develop greater resilience in themselves and others.
2a1e493c-195e-4c6c-be75-2d9f8b4f4eb0.name: Leading Organizational Change

e9319166-bbfc-4fdd-b8a6-70bd0d85350a.description: Mastering Innovation: Strategy, Process, and Tools, formerly titled Mastering Innovation: From Idea to Value Creation, gives participants the frameworks, tools, methodologies, and disciplines to develop and install a process for innovation. Earners of this badge learned to how to treat innovation as a process, manage and turn innovation into a driver of profits and growth, and execute strategic innovation to achieve success.
e9319166-bbfc-4fdd-b8a6-70bd0d85350a.name: Mastering Innovation: Strategy, Process, and Tools

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Strategy program.

bb19b0dc-03da-4d28-ab60-7e4eca25e1d9.description: In Leading Digital Transformation, participants discover ways to effectively compete, grow, and thrive in a world increasingly defined by technology. In this highly actionable program, participants develop tools and capabilities for leading a continuous, agile, and strategic endeavor to harness and stay ahead of digital disruptions.
bb19b0dc-03da-4d28-ab60-7e4eca25e1d9.name: Leading Digital Transformation

4067ac87-d055-4580-af2b-a87b1b6c7c1c.description: The Neuroscience of Business shows how the brain works and how to apply neuroscience principles in your organization to shape and improve management, team-building, and innovation. Participants learn how neuroscience reveals what consumers really think and pay attention to and what motivates them, improves their leadership capabilities by understanding the science of decision-making, and gains hands-on experience designing choice sets that shape consumer and investor decisions.
4067ac87-d055-4580-af2b-a87b1b6c7c1c.name: The Neuroscience of Business: Innovations in Leadership and Strategic Decisions

66586bb5-a29e-41eb-9d99-14306f212cd3.description: Managing Strategic Partnerships and Ecosystems, formerly titled Driving Growth Through Strategic Partnerships, is about managing and evaluating alliances. With disruptive shifts in the competitive environment, companies increasingly need to consider strategic partnerships as their primary growth mode. Earners of this badge have enhanced their ability to identify optimal partnering opportunities and have learned to design and manage partnerships in ways that maximize value.
66586bb5-a29e-41eb-9d99-14306f212cd3.name: Managing Strategic Partnerships and Ecosystems

fed54ef4-06c4-4077-b31e-79efed7da8e9.description: In People Analytics: HR Transformation through Data, Wharton’s expert faculty have shown holders of this badge to fully engage in their organization’s analytics, working at the intersection of HR management and data analytics. By developing the knowledge and tools needed to exploit this fast-growing field, they will change the way they manage talent, drive powerful business outcomes, and give their career and organization a serious advantage.
fed54ef4-06c4-4077-b31e-79efed7da8e9.name: People Analytics: HR Transformation through Data

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Strategy program.

6f66237d-ce39-4df0-98d5-ab3d08ca8c43.description: High-potential leaders are among a company's greatest assets and are recognized for their individual, team, and organizational contributions. Earners of this credential have honed their emotional intelligence for greater insight and influence, mastered a new framework to lead change more effectively, and improved their negotiation skills. They have also gained a powerful new network of global peers.
6f66237d-ce39-4df0-98d5-ab3d08ca8c43.name: High-Potential Leaders: Accelerating Your Impact

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with faculty, industry practitioners and global peers.

eecc639d-8157-46c0-9a27-3d04d6bb957a.description: Participants of Women on Boards: Building Exceptional Leaders learn how to identify the boards that are the best fit, becoming knowledgeable about the fundamental obligations of directors, and discover the right questions to ask when executing corporate governance duties. They acquire proven strategies and tools to enhance their resume and market themselves successfully to nomination committees, search firms, and corporate board consultants.
eecc639d-8157-46c0-9a27-3d04d6bb957a.name: Women on Boards: Building Exceptional Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership program.
The course must be attended for 5 days across two weeks.

8d854d5e-f689-4fe7-a32b-ef21148a880c.description: Many institutional investors, fund managers, and financial advisors have been raising their targets for real estate allocations in recent years. Earners of this badge gained a deeper understanding of the concepts, terminology, strategies, and opportunities in both domestic and global real estate investment. They have learned to analyze the pros and cons of the various ways to invest in commercial real estate and how best to incorporate commercial real estate into the overall investment strategy.
8d854d5e-f689-4fe7-a32b-ef21148a880c.name: Assessing Commercial Real Estate Investments and Markets in the Era of COVID-19

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Finance program.
Complete the five-day Wharton program, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

03ed21b4-ccb8-4162-8229-e0c92bd7706b.description: Pricing Strategies: Measuring, Capturing, and Retaining Value changes the way you think about pricing. Instead of relying on instinct or simple models, you gain a deeper understanding of pricing and its effect on your customers and your competition. This hands-on program provides you with the confidence and skills needed to choose the right pricing strategy (not the one “right price”), and to make a strong case for your decisions within the organization.
03ed21b4-ccb8-4162-8229-e0c92bd7706b.name: Pricing Strategies: Measuring, Capturing, and Retaining Value

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Marketing program.

94d0c278-3f9d-4861-9967-8bb5f9a34de2.description: Today's senior leaders need to think more strategically, communicate more persuasively, and act more decisively — all while developing the leadership of those around them. Holders of this badge from Becoming a Leader of Leaders: Pathways for Success draw on new research and insights, as well as on challenging times and pivotal leadership moments in history, which provides them with expanded strategies to strengthen leadership and build a highly effective team.
94d0c278-3f9d-4861-9967-8bb5f9a34de2.name: Becoming a Leader of Leaders: Pathways for Success

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership program.

b34fc0ec-58c6-4a8f-9952-bca83c6808d4.description: Holders of this badge have gained extensive strategic business leadership skills that enable them to embrace an end-to-end view of the organization. They develop a new set of leadership and functional skills tied to PepsiCo’s “Winning with Purpose” initiative, understand and analyze the competitive global landscape in which PepsiCo operates, combine external thinking with internal expertise to make better business decisions, and build a peer network to support their continued development.
b34fc0ec-58c6-4a8f-9952-bca83c6808d4.name: PepsiCo Global GM Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: The staff member needs to be nominated by his or her manager, showing the potential to advance to a senior leadership role in a large global company.
Attendees must attend and complete all requirements of the 15-week program sessions.

skills.name: Consumer Intimacy And Understandng Consumer Value

09b6bf74-2f6f-45e6-b4ae-53c0fd1556b8.description: Holders of this badge have successfully completed the Assessing Commercial Real Estate Investments and Markets program. They've gained a deeper understanding of the concepts, terminology, strategies, and opportunities in both domestic and global real estate investments. They have learned to analyze the pros and cons of the various ways to invest in commercial real estate and how best to incorporate commercial real estate into the overall investment strategy.
09b6bf74-2f6f-45e6-b4ae-53c0fd1556b8.name: Assessing Commercial Real Estate Investments and Markets

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Finance program.

9aa8be07-a71b-4e66-aa57-ade0cd6140d7.description: This CTBC Custom program explores Innovation Strategies in New Markets and provides participants with an understanding of how to determine the desirability, feasibility and viability of a product or service in a new market. They have grasped how to use both value creation and value capture strategies, and how discovery-driven and eco-system approaches can be used to produce sustainable competitive advantage.
9aa8be07-a71b-4e66-aa57-ade0cd6140d7.name: CTBC 2022 Executive Education Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants need to attend the full program session and participate in small group analysis work.
Participants must have the ability to transfer learnings from an academic case to current corporate business realities.

fe380cde-5c2a-4147-a67e-708a1a81d297.description: Shareholder Activism and Corporate Governance sheds an objective light on a company's features, including its governance structure and strategic & management approaches. While distinguishing good from bad corporate governance is an art form, we discuss the typical identifiers that are associated with value destruction and attracts activist attention. We consider steps & processes utilized by activists in a campaign and identify those areas critical to unlocking, or potentially destroying, value.
fe380cde-5c2a-4147-a67e-708a1a81d297.name: Shareholder Activism and Corporate Governance

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted to this Wharton Finance program.

96079c79-d489-4461-80d8-ce2d89c511af.description: Holders of this Blockchain & Digital Assets Program badge completed an integrated custom program with an overview of blockchain, cryptocurrencies, and digital assets. Sessions included major technical elements, use cases, business activity, impacts on established firms, risk areas, regulatory considerations, and broader implications for the evolution of trust. The program offered a balanced, grounded perspective to equip earners to evaluate developments relevant to their areas of responsibility.
96079c79-d489-4461-80d8-ce2d89c511af.name: Blockchain & Digital Assets Program

alignments.name: NASBA
alignments.description: This program was built in alignment with NASBA delivery standards for Continuing Professional Education credit eligibility.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners are required to complete 8 independent instructional modules (7 hours total) and actively participate in those modules.
Holders of this badge are required to successfully pass a final assessment proving their understanding of the material.

f9f22db0-24bf-4fc5-90fa-0de4eb85f71d.description: The Adaptable Leader, formerly titled The Leadership Edge, helps participants become effective leaders in today's volatile business economy. Making the transition from competent to great requires trusted guidance, while tapping into strengths & vulnerabilities. Earners gain an understanding of who they are as leaders, develop skills to lead high-performing teams, enhance individual growth & collaboration skills across a team, improve emotional intelligence, and become influential leaders.
f9f22db0-24bf-4fc5-90fa-0de4eb85f71d.name: The Adaptable Leader: Leading in a Virtual World

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Leadership program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

146e0128-1ef6-49b6-9563-f5d39cf4dddd.description: Holders of the Advanced Business Analytics Program badge have learned how to use data to analyze past business outcomes as well as how to model and predict trends. Additionally, participants in this program have learned how to leverage data and artificial intelligence to prepare a roadmap for digital transformation within their organization. This self-paced, hybrid program is offered in collaboration with Emeritus.
146e0128-1ef6-49b6-9563-f5d39cf4dddd.name: Advanced Business Analytics Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Online Partnership program
Complete the required 6 core modules within the curriculum.
Participants must also attend a week-long immersion on the University of Pennsylvania campus in Philadelphia, PA, USA.
Complete the required 2 electives out of a choice of 5 within the curriculum.

91a250b5-2201-4aeb-b1d0-05a00217a566.description: Holders of this badge have completed 5 days of Designing and Managing the Agile Supply Chains for the Future program, during which they participated in lectures, interacted with faculty and peers, and contributed their own industrial insights. They learned to take a critical look at company's existing supply chain from end-to-end, understand the complexities of managing multilayered global supply chains, and develop supply chain management strategies.
91a250b5-2201-4aeb-b1d0-05a00217a566.name: Designing and Managing the Agile Supply Chain for the Future

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Strategy Program.

skills.name: Digitizing Supply Chains Through Advanced AI And Analytics

b5e889aa-30e4-4a65-b86b-6257e7e891b3.description: Digital Marketing Strategies for the Digital Economy explores the latest emerging commerce and social media technologies, helping participants understand and embrace current disruptive innovations in marketing. Earners of this credential gained proficiency and understanding of the digital economy, marketing knowledge, and practical applications to initiate successful digital marketing strategy.
b5e889aa-30e4-4a65-b86b-6257e7e891b3.name: Digital Marketing Strategies for the Digital Economy

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the four-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

656c9a1d-abfd-4f38-bb4c-c55992025c10.description: This Sun Life Financial Advisors Continuing Education Program was created for Independent Advisors for Sun Life Financial. It allows the participants to hone their business acumen in Marketing, Strategic Management and Team Leadership. Holders of this badge can choose to complete anywhere from 3 to 10 offered sessions.
656c9a1d-abfd-4f38-bb4c-c55992025c10.name: Sun Life Financial Advisors Continuing Education Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must be recognized by Sun Life as their top tier advisors.

138c454e-244d-4b72-b650-39e8529ae931.description: Holders of this MetLife-Wharton Regional Sales Leaders Program badge have completed a comprehensive 3.5-day program, custom-designed to refocus their attention to customer-centric innovation and growth. They have also honed their skills on implementing more inclusive team decision making and fostering cross-function collaboration.
138c454e-244d-4b72-b650-39e8529ae931.name: MetLife-Wharton Regional Sales Leaders Program, 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must be nominated leaders in the MetLife Sales Organization.

ad6bf367-6ae3-4f11-94bd-24e47dabc18a.description: This Wharton/AWS Executive ID&E Strategy and Management Certificate Program unites executives to enhance business acumen, develop breakthrough thinking, and effective leadership in key Inclusion, Diversity and Equity (ID&E) areas of strategy, risk, innovation, and data analytics. Through interactive lectures and practitioner panels, this program combines theory with real business challenges to create effective strategies and plans to engage the learnings in a rapidly changing global environment.
ad6bf367-6ae3-4f11-94bd-24e47dabc18a.name: Wharton/AWS Executive ID&E Strategy and Management Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants need to attend in person and complete the Wharton/AWS Executive ID&E Strategy & Management Certificate Program.
Participants must present a Capstone project.

a7e94298-a073-40cc-a499-3cd757828e16.description: The Evertec Leadership Program was custom designed to take the level just below the C suite across Evertec’s Latin America regions and teach them the fundamentals of finance & value creation, leadership under crisis with limited information, and to manage as a team a simulated business organization. They have the tools and processes to develop and broaden their general management and analytical decision making skills required for the next generation of senior leadership at Evertec.
a7e94298-a073-40cc-a499-3cd757828e16.name: Evertec Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must attend 5 onsite days, or 10 virtual half days, of classroom, breakouts, problem solving, virtual networking and discussion.
Participant must actively participate in the business simulation exercise that takes place throughout the program.
Participants must go through a selection process by Evertec L&D and HR, identifying future high potential top talent for Evertec.

0473d773-7777-44f8-96ec-5d80ba670131.description: The Equitable at Retirement Program is designed to provide a higher level of preparation & knowledge to Equitable financial advisors to better equip them to serve the retirement planning needs of their valued clients. The intensive course focused on specific concepts and issues that are most important to the At Retirement® generation. This Custom program is part of Equitable’ s overall commitment to provide clients with the most thorough guidance on a broad range of financial retirement topics.
0473d773-7777-44f8-96ec-5d80ba670131.name: Equitable at Retirement Wharton Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants need to be Equitable Retirement Planning Advisors

95aeb999-387b-479a-915b-8b01102363b7.description: Global Strategic Leadership provides badge holders a comprehensive approach to strategy development. It stresses the importance of flexibility, emphasizing open-mindedness, agility, and creativity, which are critical for success in a global context. It helps clarify and enhance their strategic thinking and ability to create and communicate a sustainable vision of the future for their organizations.
95aeb999-387b-479a-915b-8b01102363b7.name: Global Strategic Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Leadership Program

d222ceab-0c32-40a8-a085-38a92dc86f58.description: Chief security officers need new kinds of management & leadership skills to convey the relevance of security to their organization’s top decision makers. The Wharton/ASIS Program for Security Executives provides the leadership & management skills to communicate the impact of security decisions on your organization to the C-suite so you can advance your security priorities. Wharton and ASIS Int'l co-developed the curriculum to ensure it meets the learning needs of today’s senior security leaders.
d222ceab-0c32-40a8-a085-38a92dc86f58.name: Wharton | ASIS Program for Security Executives: Making the Business Case for Security

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enrolled into this Wharton Leadership program.

ef9cac3b-b3c0-43e2-b0d5-d6f571ec243d.description: Participants in this Boards that Lead: Corporate Governance That Builds Value program have received the knowledge they need to be high-performing board members who add significant value to their company. They have gained a new perspective on corporate board governance and what constitutes a strong board, while acquiring the skills to more easily collaborate, lead, and motivate each other and management.
ef9cac3b-b3c0-43e2-b0d5-d6f571ec243d.name: Boards That Lead: Corporate Governance That Builds Value

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership program.

3bf809ac-95cd-4bb5-b30e-ca7fb5f4cb94.description: Holders of this Burris Logistics Strategic Leadership badge completed an immersive, experiential, and interactive learning journey program. At the end of the program, the participants will be able to work as “high impact teams, creating strategic road maps for Burris’ growth.”
3bf809ac-95cd-4bb5-b30e-ca7fb5f4cb94.name: Burris Logistics Strategic Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: The holder of this badge was nominated to take the program by the Senior Leadership of Burris Logistics.

0d5f6a6a-4a4f-4390-a9bb-22eed4b7ca17.description: The Equitable At Retirement Summit is designed for Equitable financial advisors who have successfully completed the At Retirement weeklong program at Wharton Executive Education. Equitable’s financial professionals are invited to return to Wharton for the annual At Retirement® Summit featuring Wharton faculty and industry experts to further continue their retirement education. Equitable chose Wharton because of its leadership in management research, education and knowledge creation.
0d5f6a6a-4a4f-4390-a9bb-22eed4b7ca17.name: Equitable at Retirement Graduate Summit

badge_template_activities.title: Participants need to be Equitable Retirement Planning Advisors.
Participants need to first attend and completed the Equitable at Retirement Wharton Program.

788444fb-5eea-45bf-a26b-122af5360231.description: Innovation for Growth: Strategies for Creating Value helped participants learn different methods and fresh approaches to identify business growth opportunities and foster a culture of continuous innovation within their organizations.
788444fb-5eea-45bf-a26b-122af5360231.name: Innovation for Growth: Strategies for Creating Value

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Strategy program.

51a759d6-a017-4ba8-bd24-60b0fe5003ab.description: Holders of this Bristol Myers Squibb Marketing Director Innovation & Leadership Summit badge completed a Custom Program designed for Bristol Myers Squibb (BMS) which combined the development of leadership skills with the vision, trends, and frameworks needed to address the strategic innovation processes of BMS Marketing.
51a759d6-a017-4ba8-bd24-60b0fe5003ab.name: Bristol Myers Squibb Marketing Director Innovation & Leadership Summit

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must be an Oncology Marketing Leader.
Participants must attend the entire program on the Wharton campus.

2952c052-f2ad-4e10-9ebf-6bb2d4c1c79f.description: The Adaptable Leader program helps participants to become effective leaders in today's volatile business economy. Earners of this badge gained understanding of who they are as a leader, developed skills to lead high-performing teams, enhanced individual growth and collaboration skills across a team, appreciated their role on a team, improved emotional intelligence, and became influential leaders who inspire and develop the team.
2952c052-f2ad-4e10-9ebf-6bb2d4c1c79f.name: The Adaptable Leader: Strategies for Emerging Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership program.
Complete the five-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

8a834c31-540c-431b-a9ee-f70b02b55c32.description: The Strategic Persuasion Workshop provides the holders of this badge with a highly practical and universal framework that allows them to become more influential within their organization. Specifically, as a result of successfully completing this program, the executive can read situations better and adjust the way he or she responds to them in a faster and more effective way.
8a834c31-540c-431b-a9ee-f70b02b55c32.name: Strategic Persuasion Workshop: The Art and Science of Selling Ideas

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Leadership program.
Complete the four-day program at Wharton, engaging with Wharton faculty, industry practitioners, and global peers.

d47cfdf9-9527-4395-aff5-3eba87d674f2.description: Creating and Leading High-Performing Teams is a unique leadership program for executives that combines the best insights from research and case studies, tested in the context of hands-on, experiential learning. Earners of this badge enhanced their ability to lead high-performing teams and developed strong leadership skills.
d47cfdf9-9527-4395-aff5-3eba87d674f2.name: Creating and Leading High-Performing Teams

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to enroll in this Wharton Leadership program.

e7d5ef9e-fcec-49e6-bec3-7d4ce1647bcf.description: Holders of this Leading with Business Analytics badge have FIRST completed the required Advanced Business Analytics Program (ABAP) and have the desire to advance their leadership capabilities and further deepen their analytics capability. By taking and completing this 2-program Elective, Alumni status has also been achieved.
e7d5ef9e-fcec-49e6-bec3-7d4ce1647bcf.name: Leading with Business Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Partnership program.
Participants must first attend and fully complete the full Advance Business Analytics Program.
To complete LEAP and achieve Wharton alumni status, ABAP participants must complete two additional Wharton Executive Education open enrollment programs within 12 months of acceptance.

60f54ed6-48b7-4ecb-a8c0-95c37f1827ab.description: Earners of this Economics of Blockchain and Digital Assets badge attended the world’s first executive education program focused on the economics of blockchain and digital assets They learn how to identify the value of this emerging technology in order to provide growth opportunities for your business. Participants are able to analyze the fundamental value and investing drivers of various digital assets, and assess structures and processes of decentralization organizations.
60f54ed6-48b7-4ecb-a8c0-95c37f1827ab.name: Economics of Blockchain and Digital Assets

alignments.name: Accreditation
alignments.description: This is the only Accredited Blockchain Program.

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this high-impact, Wharton Online Certificate Program.
Learning at your own pace, participants must complete the 6-week online program, 8–10 hours per week, in its entirety.

6d906d46-f434-4684-afc2-90a63cce74fe.description: The Wharton Nursing Leaders Program provides nursing leaders with tested tools and frameworks that will clarify and enhance their strategic thinking, whether they need to negotiate for additional resources, unveil a new strategy, or simply oversee the daily operations of their department. Earners of this badge have gained an awareness of the strategic issues facing their organization and enhanced their ability to manage resources, both human and financial.
6d906d46-f434-4684-afc2-90a63cce74fe.name: Wharton Nursing Leaders Program

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to be accepted into this Wharton Leadership and Industry Association program.
Fully engage and participate in the highly interactive lectures, exercises, and case studies, both in the classroom and in smaller work groups.
